text.__SUMMARY__: Solanum pinetorum is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae. It is endemic to Brazil.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Solanum pinetorum". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T35475A9934642. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T35475A9934642.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
